metadata.description:
In the spirit of community and sport, and inspired by the largest quad and inline skating festival in the U.S.—the Blading Cup—the DRx Skate Co. collection features digital wearables built for interoperability as well as corresponding physical apparel with signature Drug Receipts graphics and mind-altering DRx-perience augmented reality.

Shop Drug Receipts merch including DRx Skate Co. physical apparel online: https://www.drx.store/
        
Drug Receipts Genesis token holders receive special perks, like discounts up to 100%, and access to limited drops. Become a Drug Snuggler today: https://opensea.io/collection/drugreceipts
